entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
